about_the_game:
It is a set that you can purchase the the eighteen famous horses of Narita Bryan, Deep Impact, Orvevre, Taiki Shuttle, El Condor Pasa, Lord Kanaloa, Maurice, TM Opera O, Kitasan Black, Air Groove, Vodka, Daiwa Scarlet, Buena Vista, Gentildonna, Almond Eye, Agnes Takion, Kurofune, and King Kamehameha for a discount.

※ You can get 18 of these DLCs free of charge by using Rainbow Charm + In-game money, even if you do not apply DLC.
detailed_description:

※ You can get 18 of these DLCs free of charge by using Rainbow Charm + In-game money, even if you do not apply DLC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10 Windows® 8.1 Japanese version 64 bit
  • Processor: Core I5 2400 or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 1GB or over, 1280 x 720 pixel display or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
